function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global carbon emissions reduction targets not met","Impact":"Increase in global carbon emissions and exacerbation of climate change","Mitigation":"Investment in renewable energy, carbon capture technology, and policy enforcement","Technologies":"Renewable energy technology, carbon capture and storage technology","People":"Global population, future generations","Owner":"International organizations, national governments, and industry leaders"},{"Description":"Failure to integrate existing environmental policies","Impact":"Loss of coherence and efficiency in environmental protection efforts","Mitigation":"Ensure comprehensive integration of policies, coordination among relevant stakeholders, and continuous monitoring and evaluation","Technologies":"Policy integration tools, stakeholder engagement platforms","People":"Environmental agencies, policymakers, and industry leaders","Owner":"Environmental agencies, national governments"},{"Description":"Lack of support for carbon-dependent Member States in transitioning to renewable energy","Impact":"Economic and social instability in carbon-dependent Member States, resistance to energy transition, and negative environmental impact","Mitigation":"Implementation of comprehensive support programs, investment in renewable energy infrastructure, and continuous monitoring of the transition process","Technologies":"Renewable energy technology, economic support programs, and data monitoring tools","People":"Residents of carbon-dependent Member States, government officials, and industry leaders","Owner":"National governments, international organizations"}]}
